data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of East Berbice-Corentyne
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of East Berbice-Corentyne, Guyana
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 17,238 believers in East Berbice-Corentyne to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 92,462 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, help the people of East Berbice-Corentyne, Guyana to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in East Berbice-Corentyne.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Urdu people.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 109,700 people living in East Berbice-Corentyne.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in East Berbice-Corentyne with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 17,238 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

location.name: East Berbice-Corentyne
